description: Our 1 bed apartment is located in North Williamsburg. Has amazing views! is close to great restaurants, outdoor markets, and bars. You’ll love the place and the neighborhood.  Our kitchen is fully stocked, juice pressed machine, neespreso, etc. The place is good for couples, or also for a group of three/four friends. We have 1 bed and one pull out sofa in the living. We are near the L train, wholefoods, etc..
name: Williambsurg 1 Bed prime location!
review: Clara is a great host and her apartment is really nice and cosy. The view on Manhattan is incredible. The apartment itself is very nicely decorated and fonctional. It is very clean and the attention to detail is perfect. The building is brand new as well as this part of Williamsburg. It is very convinient for grocery shopping and restaurants. We definitely recommand to stay there.
